schema.agent: string - which agent (trade-research, agent-engineer, researcher, etc.)
schema.responsibility: string | null - which standing responsibility, if any
schema.completed: boolean - did we finish what we set out to do?
friction: array of strings - what slowed us down or was hard
mistakes: array of strings - wrong turns, errors made
rootCauses: array of strings - why did friction/mistakes happen?
schema.improvementIdea: string | null - idea logged to improvements/ideas.json
schema.learningLogged: boolean - did we add to learnings.json?
schema.notes: string | null - anything else worth noting
